content: create a beautiful crochet rose bouquet with this quick simple and stash busting crochet pattern these little beauties will liven up any living space and make great gifts for valentine s day mother s day or just because made from scrap yarn this crochet rose pattern is a true stash buster use your small amounts of left over yarn to create beautiful crochet roses in all sizes and colors to create a crochet rose bouquet that is uniquely yours scent them with a little bit of rose oil and you have a beautiful display of roses that look great as a bundle in a vase or by themselves **skill level ** easy/medium to advanced beginner - creating these roses is fairly straight forward each piece of this pattern is worked in only two row so they are quick and fun crocheters looking to follow this pattern should know how to chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet and treble_crochet you will also have to work on the back side of the chains but there are pictures to help you through there are also pictures to help you through the entire assembly of this crochet rose pattern **pattern includes ** 1 full version pdf with photo tutorial this photo tutorial also has the steps written in detail not short hand to help beginners through 2 printer friendly pdf with only one picture to save ink **terms used ** us standard pattern is written in english size two sizes of rose bud are included large and small rose bud depending on size made is approximately 2 to 3 inches in diameter each rose is approximately 10 inches tall you can change the height very easily if you prefer both the side of the crochet rose bud and the length of the stem can be customized easily **materials required ** the crochet roses created for the sample of this pattern used medium 4 weight yarn however you can use any scrap yarn you d like you will need approximately 5-6 g or 8 yards per rose bud you will need approximately 5-6 g or 8 yards per leaf and wrapping the stem you will also need 18 gauge craft wire any color for stem tools 5 mm h-8 hook or hook that corresponds with your yarn tapestry needle scissors wire cutters or something to cut the craft wire with make sure to tag me in your instagram photos so i can show you some love tag @theloopholefoxcrochet or use #theloopholefoxcrochet to show me your finished work i hope these crochet roses bring you as much joy as they ve brought me happy crocheting the loophole fox
